```{r}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
```

```{r load packages}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

```{r Load data}

```

```{r - Predictor to Index}
### Components
Para.to.Index <- tribble(
  ~Index, ~Predictor,
   "PM25", "pm_1yr",
   "NO2", "no2_1yr"
   ) %>% 
  mutate(Index = as.factor(Index),
         Predictor = as.factor(Predictor))

### Components residuals
Para.to.Index.resid <- tribble(
  ~Index, ~Predictor,
   "PM25_NO2", "PM_NO2",
   "NO2_PM25", "NO2_PM"
   ) %>% 
  mutate(Index = as.factor(Index),
         Predictor = as.factor(Predictor))
```

```{r Outcome to Cause }
Outcome.to.Cause <- tribble(
  ~Cause, ~Outcome,
  "All-Cause", "allcuz",
  "Non-Accidental", "nacc",
  "Accidental", "acc",
  "Cardiovascular", "cvd",
  "IHD", "ihd",
  "CHF", "chf",
  "CBV", "cbv",
  "Respiratory", "resp",
  "COPD", "copd",
  "Pneumonia", "pneu",
  "URI", "uri",
  "ARDS", "ards",
  "Cancer", "canc",
  "Lung Cancer", "lungc",
  "Sepsis", "seps",
  "Vascular dementia", "VaD",
  "Alzheimer", "AD",
  "Neurodegeneration", "NeD",
  "Unspecified Dementia", "UsD",
  "Type1 Diabetes", "diabt1",
  "Type2 Diabetes", "diabt2",
  "Diabetes", "diab",
  "Kidney Disease", "kidn"
)
```


```{r Output Base}
out.base <- read.csv(here('output','analysis','base.csv')) %>% 
  merge(Para.to.Index) %>% 
  merge(Outcome.to.Cause) %>% 
  mutate(HR = round(exp(Coef * 10),3),
         HR.L = round(exp((Coef-1.96*std) * 10),3),
         HR.U = round(exp((Coef+1.96*std) * 10),3),
         Subgroup = "Base", 
         Value = "Base") %>% 
  arrange(Config, Value) %>% 
  select(Index, Cause, Subgroup, Value, HR, HR.L, HR.U)
```

```{r Output Age}
out.age = data.frame()
for (i in c("LE75", "M75")){
  dt <- read.csv(here('output','analysis',paste('age',i,'.csv', sep= ""))) %>% 
    mutate(Value = i)
  out.age  <-  rbind(out.age, dt)
}

out.age <- out.age %>% 
  merge(Para.to.Index) %>% 
  merge(Outcome.to.Cause) %>% 
  mutate(HR = round(exp(Coef * 10),3),
         HR.L = round(exp((Coef-1.96*std) * 10),3),
         HR.U = round(exp((Coef+1.96*std) * 10),3),
         Subgroup = "Age") %>% 
  arrange(Config, Value) %>% 
  select(Index, Cause, Subgroup, Value, HR, HR.L, HR.U)
```


```{r Output BRFSS}
out.brfss = data.frame()
for (i in c("brfss0", "brfss")){
  dt <- read.csv(here('output','analysis',paste(i,'.csv', sep= ""))) %>% 
    mutate(Value = i)
  out.brfss  <-  rbind(out.brfss, dt)
}

out.brfss <- out.brfss %>% 
  mutate(Parameter = gsub(".*Yr_", "", Predictor),
         Parameter = as.factor(Parameter)) %>% 
  merge(Para.to.Index) %>% 
  merge(Outcome.to.Cause) %>% 
  mutate(HR = round(exp(Coef * 10),3),
         HR.L = round(exp((Coef-1.96*std) * 10),3),
         HR.U = round(exp((Coef+1.96*std) * 10),3),
         Subgroup = "BRFSS") %>% 
  arrange(Config, Value) %>% 
  select(Index, Cause, Subgroup, Value, HR, HR.L, HR.U) 
```

```{r}
out.results <- out.base %>% 
  add_row(out.ses) %>% 
  add_row(out.resid) %>% 
  add_row(out.age) %>% 
  add_row(out.sex) %>% 
  add_row(out.race) %>% 
  add_row(out.urbanicity) %>% 
  add_row(out.urbanses) %>% 
  add_row(out.brfss) %>% 
  add_row(out.rc4) %>% 
  add_row(out.rc8)

save(out.results, file = here('output','analysis','out-results.RDa'))
write.csv(out.results, 
          file = here('output','analysis','out-results.csv'))
```
